solution_line_template: Isabel has {total_apples} apples - {unripe_apples} that are not ripe = <<{total_apples}-{unripe_apples}={ripe_apples}>>{ripe_apples} ripe apples.
To make pies they will need {ripe_apples} apples / {apples_per_pie} apples per pie = <<{ripe_apples}/{apples_per_pie}={num_pies}>>{num_pies} pies.
